channel.title: Village Trouble
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Village Trouble"

item.title: Re: Village Trouble
item.content:encoded: Its now set so if they deny it then you can not apply until they reset their application. So basically your screwed until they change the message.

item.title: Village Trouble
item.content:encoded:
What does it mean when it says

VILLAGE DENIED YOUR APPLICATION! They are not accepting applications from you at this time.

Instantly after I apply and they did not deny my application in the last 7 days and also it is my third day after leaving my last village. I was kicked from the village little over a week ago because I was on vacation.

Why Can't I join the village?
